Amrita College Bangalore was established under the Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Bangalore (UGC-approved) in 2002 and is accredited with A Grade by NAAC. These courses are provided across the various engineering streams. Amrita School of Engineering Bengaluru is famous for its flagship courses such as BTech and MTech. Amrita School of Engineering Bengaluru's course curriculum is credit-based and the syllabus is research and industry-oriented. Amrita School of Engineering Bengaluru also organises various international and national conferences, workshops, seminars, colloquia, training programmes, contests, and others. The college's library at present holds about 36,000 books, 3,101 CDs & DVDs, 2,000 project reports, 2,000 Back Volumes of Journals, 109 Engineering journalsand others.
